topic.title: POST /gemfire-api/v1/queries?id=<queryId>&q=<OQL-statement>
topic.shortdesc: Create (prepare) the specified parameterized query and assign the corresponding ID for lookup.

strow.stentry: Required. Unique identifier for the named parameterized query.
Required. OQL query statement. Use doublequotes to surround the OQL query statement.

stentry.pre: "SELECT o FROM /orders o WHERE o.quantity > $1 AND o.totalprice > $2"

note.p: For this release, you cannot specify the query string inside the request body (as JSON). You must specify the query as a URL parameter.

section.title: Example Request
section.codeblock: POST /gemfire-api/v1/queries?id=selectOrders&q="SELECT o FROM /orders o WHERE o.quantity > $1 AND o.totalprice > $2" Accept: application/json
